FuncDef:
The netstream mpls-aware ip command configures the mode of sampling MPLS packets.
The undo netstream mpls-aware ip command restores the default settings. The netstream mpls-aware ip command configures the mode of sampling MPLS packets. The undo netstream mpls-aware ip command restores the default settings. By default, only the IP packets encapsulated in the MPLS packets are sampled.
CLIs: netstream mpls-aware { label-only | ip-only | label-and-ip } ip
undo netstream mpls-aware [ label-only | ip-only | label-and-ip ] ip

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that only labels in the MPLS packets are sampled.
-

Indicates that only the IP packets encapsulated in the MPLS packets are sampled.
-

Indicates that both labels and IP packets encapsulated in the MPLS packets are sampled.
-
